tour_name: Iberian Passion: Spain & Portugal Cultural Expedition

sections.title: Lisbon and Sintra: A Romantic Portuguese Beginning
sections.content: Begin your Iberian adventure in the captivating city of Lisbon. Explore the historic Alfama and Bairro Alto neighborhoods, soaking in the city's unique charm. Discover the architectural marvel of Jerónimo's Monastery. Enjoy unforgettable evenings, including a romantic dinner accompanied by soul-stirring Fado music. Embark on a day trip to the enchanting town of Sintra, a UNESCO World Heritage site, where you'll wander through fairytale palaces and lush gardens. Consider a private tour to make this a truly memorable experience.

sections.title: Porto and Douro Valley: Wine, Culture, and Scenic Splendor
sections.content: Journey north to Porto, a city renowned for its port wine and rich history. Immerse yourselves in the city's wine culture, with a visit to the WOW Cultural District (World of Wine), an area filled with interactive museums and wine experiences. Indulge in a wine-infused spa treatment for ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation. Embark on a scenic excursion to the Douro Valley, a breathtaking landscape of terraced vineyards. Enjoy private wine tastings at prestigious estates, savoring the region's finest offerings and perhaps enjoying a boat tour on the Douro River.

sections.title: Seville and Granada: Flamenco, Palaces, and Moorish Heritage
sections.content: Travel south to Seville, the heart of Andalusia, where you'll experience the passionate energy of flamenco. Witness a captivating performance and explore the magnificent Alcázar Palace, a stunning example of Moorish architecture. Continue to Granada, home to the breathtaking Alhambra Palace, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Explore its intricate details and lush Generalife gardens, a testament to Moorish artistry. In the evening, enjoy a romantic dinner in the Albaicín neighborhood, with panoramic views of the Alhambra.

sections.title: Valencia and Barcelona: Coastal Charm and Artistic Grandeur
sections.content: Head east to Valencia, a vibrant coastal city. Visit the futuristic City of Arts and Sciences, a stunning architectural complex. Indulge in the city's Mediterranean cuisine, known for its fresh seafood and paella. Continue to Barcelona, a cosmopolitan city renowned for its art, architecture, and vibrant culture. Explore the Gothic Quarter's narrow streets and discover the architectural masterpiece of the Sagrada Familia. Consider a private tour of Gaudi's other works.

sections.title: Mallorca: An Island Paradise
sections.content: Fly to Mallorca, a Mediterranean island paradise, for a relaxing retreat. Indulge in a romantic dinner at a refined restaurant located in the beautiful La Residencia, enjoying panoramic views and exquisite cuisine. Explore the island's pristine beaches, charming villages, and picturesque coves. Consider a private yacht charter for a day of exploring the coastline and secluded bays or a visit to a world class restaurant.

sections.title: Return to Lisbon and Farewell
sections.content: Return to Lisbon for a leisurely exploration of the city's hidden gems. Revisit your favorite spots or discover new corners of this charming capital. Enjoy a final exquisite meal at a Michelin-starred restaurant, savoring the flavors of Portugal before your departure. Reflect on the unforgettable memories created during your Iberian adventure, ending your honeymoon with an extra day to enjoy the amazing beaches nearby before departing.
